DOCUMENTS REQUIRED FOR PAYMENT AT SIGHT IF THE SHIPMENT IS COMPLETED TILL 15.08.2024:
 1/ EXPORT DECLARATION OF CARGO SHOWING EXPORTER: MOSB ENERJI  ELEKTRIK URETIM A.S , ADDRESS: KECILIKOYOSB MAH. HALIL YURTSEVEN  CAD. NO:1 YUNUSEMRE/MANISA, TURKEY; BUYER: TIBIEL EOOD, 70  KRAKRA STR, PERNIK 2300, BULGARIA, DESCRIPTION OF CARGO AS PER  CURRENT LC, SERIAL NUMBER OF ENGINE, DULY DATED AND SIGNED BY  TURKISH CUSTOMS AUTHORITIES, IN TURKISH LANGUAGE - 1 COPY, ALONG  WITH A TRANSLATION INTO ENGLISH LANGUAGE, SIGNED AND STAMPED BY  A TRANSLATING AGENCY. ENGLISH TRANSLATION WILL PREVAIL-1  ORIGINAL

NO:1 YUNUSEMRE/MANISA, TURKEY AND APPLICANT AS MENTIONED IN FIELD 50 AS CONSIGNEE, SHOWING FULL DESCRIPTION OF GOODS AS PER PRESENT LC, DATE OF LOADING ONTO TRUCK AT SELLER'S SITE, DULY DATED, STAMPED AND SIGNED BY THE SHIPPER AND BY THE  TRANSPORT COMPANY.

NO:1 YUNUSEMRE/MANISA, TURKEY TO THE BUYER TIBIEL EOOD, 70  KRAKRA STR, PERNIK 2300, BULGARIA, SHOWING , CUSTOMS HS CODE,  DESCRIPTION OF CARGO AS PER CURRENT LC , SERIAL NUMBER OF  ENGINES PAAE010386 AND/OR PAAE010387 AND/OR PAAE010389 AND/OR  PAAE010390 AND OBSERVING THE EXACT AMOUNT OF THE GOODS SHIPPED,  TERMS OF DELIVERY - EXW MANISA, TURKEY ( INCOTERMS 2010) SIGNED  AND STAMPED BY THE SELLER - 3 ORIGINALS AND 3 COPIES

NO:1  YUNUSEMRE/MANISA,TURKEY TO THE BUYER-TIBIEL EOOD 70 KRAKRA STR,  PERNIK 2300 BULGARIA, SHOWING NUMBERS OF ENGINES SHIPPED,  NUMBER OF COMMERCIAL INVOICE AND DETAILED DESCRIPTION OF CARGO  AS PER COMMERCIAL INVOICE, SERIAL NUMBER OF ENGINES PAAE010386 AND/OR PAAE010387 AND/OR PAAE010389 AND/OR PAAE010390, INCLUDING  SIZES, WEIGHT,SIGNED AND STAMPED BY THE SELLER,IN 3 ORIGINALS  AND 3 COPIES

NO:1 YUNUSEMRE/MANISA, TURKEY AND CONSIGNEE - TIBIEL EOOD 70  KRAKRA STR, PERNIK 2300 BULGARIA, STATING ORIGIN OF THE  EQUIPMENT: FINLAND, DULY DATED, ELECTRONICALLY SIGNED, SHOWING  THE DESCRIPTION OF CARGO AS PER COMMERCIAL INVOICE AND NUMBER OF  COMMERCIAL INVOICE AS PER ITEM 3 - 1 ORIGINAL

NO:1 YUNUSEMRE/MANISA, TURKEY, CONSIGNEE: TIBIEL EOOD 70  KRAKRA STR, PERNIK 2300 BULGARIA, COUNTRY OF XPORTATION: TURKEY, COUNTRY OF DESTINATION: BULGARIA, DETAILED DESCRIPTION OF CARGO AS PER CURRENT LC, SERIAL NUMBER OF ENGINES PAAE010386 AND/OR PAAE010387 AND/OR PAAE010389 AND/OR PAAE010390, DULY DATED, STAMPED BY THE CUSTOMS AUTHORITY AND SIGNED BY THE EXPORTER - ONE ORIGINAL.

.B.DOCUMENTS REQUIRED FOR PAYMENT AT SIGHT AFTER 15.08.2024 IF THE SHIPMENT IS NOT COMPLETED TILL 15.08.2024:
 1.DULY DATED PROTOCOL SIGNED BY THE BENEFICIARY AND APPLICANT,  STATING THAT THE DISMANTLING OF THE GOODS IS NOT ACCOMPLISHED  TILL 15.08.2024 AND THE PAYMENT IS DUE ACCORDING TO THE  PROVISIONS OF THE CONTARACT NO 20243101 DD 31.01.2024 AND  ADDENDUM 1 DATED 11.03.2024- 1 ORIGINAL 
 2.COMMERCIAL INVOICE ISSUED FOR THE AMOUNT OF EUR 2 600 000
Документите да бъдат представени в рамките на 21 дни след датата на транспортния документ, но в рамките на валидността на акредитива./ Documents to be presented within 21 days after the date of transport document however within the validity of the D/C.


		Допълнителни условия/ Additional Conditions:
        1.THE L/C AMOUNT COVERS 2 600 000 EUR OF THE TOTAL CONTACT VALUE AS PER CONTRACT NO NO20243101 dd31.01.2024 AND ADDENDUM 1 DATED 11.03.2024. THE REMAINING VALUE IS PAID OUTSIDE THE PRESENT L/C.
 2.THE COMMERCIAL INVOICES SHOULD BE ISSUED FOR EACH ENGINE SEPARATELY SHOWING ITS VALUE WHICH IS 650 000 EUR PER  ENGINE
 3.PHOTOCOPIES OF DOCUMENT I/O ORIGINAL COPIES ARE NT ACCEPTABLE.
 4.ALL DOCUMENTS EXCEPT THE DOCUMENT UNDER 46A 1 TO BE ISSUED IN  ENGLISH LANGUAGE. DOCUMENT UNDER 46A1 IS TO BE ISSUED IN TURKISH  LANGUAGE ALONG WITH A TRANSLATION IN ENGLISH.
 5. ALL DOCUMENTS TO SHOW DETAILED DESCRIPTION OF THE GOODS AND L/C NUMBER.
 6.DOCUMENTS UNDER FIELD 45A. OPTION A -TO BE PRESENTED 21 DAYS  AFTER THE DATE OF ISSUANCE OF THE TRANSPORT DOCUMENT FOR  DOCUMENTS UNDER FIELD 45A OPTION B- TO BE PRESENTED WITHIN L/C  VALIDITY.
 7.PHOTOCOPIES OF DOCUMENTS FOR OUR FILES TO BE PRESENTED, OTHERWISE EUR 30,00 WILL BE DEDUCTED FROM THE PROCEEDS.
 8.PHOTOCOPIES OF DOCUMENTS AND DOCUMENTS REPRODUSED BY ANY  REPROGRAPHIC SYSTEMS ARE NOT ACCEPABLE AS ORIGINALS EVEN IF  STAMPED AS ORIGINAL.
 9.UPON PRESENTATION OF DISCREPANT DOCUMENTS WE SHALL DEDUCT  OUR DISCREPANCY FEE AMOUNTING TO EUR 50.00 (FOR EACH SET OF  PRESENTED DOCUMENTS) FROM THE PAYMENT UNDER THE L/C.
